adrFormatAddress: 375 South End Ave #19B, New York, NY 10280, USA

originalText.text: Bill was incredibly generous with his time and sharing his knowledge of the ins and outs of LL 152 regulation. I reached out to him after finding his website in a google search, and he immediately contacted me and spent a good 30 minutes on the phone with me, knowing that my questions were theoretical. I’m glad I found someone trustworthy and passionate, and trust his advise and resources.

text.text: Bill was incredibly generous with his time and sharing his knowledge of the ins and outs of LL 152 regulation. I’m glad I found someone trustworthy and passionate, and trust his advise and resources.

originalText.text: Bill and Keep My Gas came very highly recommended and I can see why. For quick context, I am the board president of a small condo that has recently decided to pursue self-management because of the consistently awful experiences we've had with property management companies. From our first conversation, it became clear that Keep My Gas wasn't exactly right for our small condo in the immediate future, but Bill didn't let that stop him from going out of his way to help me make sure our building was LL152 compliant or from reaching out to his extensive network to find vetted vendors to serve our needs. This is the kind of community-first mentality we need in this great city of ours. That's what helps turn buildings into homes and people in neighbors. If you have the chance in any capacity to work with Bill and his network, do not pass it up!

originalText.text:
If you are looking for someone to take the headache out of finding someone to do your gas inspection and complete all the necessary filings, I highly recommend KeepMyGas. I am very pleased with their service.

Bill was very knowledgeable and informative about the Local Law 152 and quite willing to share his knowledge with me. He took my calls promptly and answered all my questions. He runs a very organized and informed business, that is honest and up front.

In addition, his inspection quote was very detailed, including a specific description of services to be performed by the inspector, and he was very flexible with the inspection appointment times. He sent emails containing attachments of the filings right after they were made, which was much appreciated.

In short, he made the process easy and pain-free. I highly recommend KeepMyGas.

originalText.text: Bill Weidner, the proprietor, was incredibly helpful and a great source of information. If you need to complete your LL152 compliance or have any questions related to LL152, make KeepMyGas your only stop!
